input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "JAXXON"
Reference Product Name: "14k Silver Cuban Link Chain - 8mm"
Reference Product Description:
Introducing our silver 8mm stainless steel Cuban Link Chain â€“ a statement of timeless elegance and enduring strength. Crafted with precision and exceptional resiliency, this chain is designed to withstand tarnishing, corrosion, and daily wear. Elevate your style with its bold 8mm gauge and classic Cuban link design, making it the perfect choice for any occasions.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='GLD 14K White Gold Cuban Necklace'
  - Name='The GLD Shop GLD Signature Cuban Size'
  - Name='18K Diamond Cuban Necklace'
  - Name='18K Yellow Gold Diamond Prong Cuban Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 10mm Iced Out Cuban Link Gold Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 5mm Cuban Gold Set'
  - Name='JAXXON 10mm Cuban Silver Chain Set'
  - Name='JAXXON 8mm Cuban Gold Set'
  - Name='JAXXON 8mm JX1 Automatic Watch + Cuban Link'
  - Name='JAXXON Youth Cuban + Rope Silver Chain Stack'
  - Name='JAXXON 5mm Cuban Chain Set'
  - Name='JAXXON Franco Silver Set'
  - Name='JAXXON 5mm Cuban Link Gold Chain'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Both are Cuban link chains with a focus on quality metals; this one is white gold, the reference is silver stainless steel, but both share core design and purpose.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The GLD Shop GLD Signature Cuban Size
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Likely a Cuban link chain but less detail on size or material; relevant due to the Cuban style but lacks specifics matching the 8mm silver reference.
Cuban chain style with diamonds and 18K gold; similar silhouette and purpose but differs in embellishment and material from the plain silver stainless steel chain.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 18K Yellow Gold Diamond Prong Cuban Chain
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cuban link with diamonds in yellow gold; similar chain design and premium materials but different from silver stainless steel without diamonds.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 10mm Iced Out Cuban Link Gold Chain
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand, Cuban link chain with close thick gauge (10mm vs 8mm) but gold and iced out versus plain silver.
Same brand, Cuban design but smaller 5mm gauge and gold instead of silver stainless steel; similar form and function but differs in thickness and material.
Same brand and silver metal, Cuban link style, thicker 10mm compared to reference 8mm; very close in material and design.
Identical gauge (8mm) and brand with Cuban link, but gold instead of silver; closely matches the reference in size and design structure.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 8mm JX1 Automatic Watch + Cuban Link
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Includes Cuban link chain but bundled with a watch; the chain is likely similar but the product combination and potential construction differ.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON Youth Cuban + Rope Silver Chain Stack
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Includes silver Cuban link and rope chain; similar material and style focus but stacked and likely thinner or styled for youth, making it less identical.
5mm gauge Cuban chain set from same brand and style family but smaller gauge and possibly different metal or finish than 8mm silver stainless steel chain.
Silver chain set from JAXXON but Franco chain is a different link style from Cuban, reducing relevance despite material.
Same Cuban link style and brand; different gauge (5mm) and gold metal instead of 8mm silver, so similar but not very close.
